title: The Autobiography of a Slander
creator: Edna Lyall
description: LibriVox recording of The Autobiography of a Slander, by Edna Lyall. Read by Rhonda Federman. The Autobiography of a Slander exposes the consequences of reckless words or, even worse, intentionally disparaging words. In this moral tale, told from the point of view of "the slander", Edna Lyall (pseudonym used by Ada Ellen Bayley) reveals her ideals and goals in life and relationships. (Summary by Rhonda Federman) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; literature; audiobook; fiction; philosophy; short stories; literature
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
